trans-unit.source: Manages a standard endpoint element for a service application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 管理服務應用程式組態檔的標準端點項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardEndpointElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardEndpointElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Applies the content of a specified configuration endpoint to the current configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 將指定組態端點的內容套用至目前的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: An endpoint that enables clients to find and communicate with the service.
trans-unit.target: 端點，可讓用戶端尋找並與服務通訊。

trans-unit.source: An endpoint element that defines the physical transfer of messages back and forth between the client and the service.
trans-unit.target: 端點項目，定義用戶端與服務間之間往來的實際訊息傳輸。

trans-unit.source: Applies the content of a specific service endpoint to the current channel endpoint element.
trans-unit.target: 將指定服務端點內容套用至目前的通道端點項目。

trans-unit.source: An endpoint that enables clients to find and communicate with the service.
trans-unit.target: 端點，可讓用戶端尋找並與服務通訊。

trans-unit.source: An endpoint element that defines how clients find and communicate with the service.
trans-unit.target: 可定義用戶端定義與服務通訊方式的端點項目。

trans-unit.source: Applies the content of a specific service endpoint to the current service endpoint element.
trans-unit.target: 將特定服務端點內容套用至目前的服務組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Information about what is contained in messages being sent from an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 從端點傳送之訊息所包含內容的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, creates a service endpoint from message information contained in the specified contract description.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，會從包含於指定合約描述的訊息資訊中建立服務端點。

trans-unit.source: A service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes and verifies the format of the specified endpoint in a service application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 初始化並驗證服務應用程式組態檔中的指定端點格式。

trans-unit.source: An endpoint element that defines the physical transfer of messages back and forth between the client and the service.
trans-unit.target: 端點項目，定義用戶端與服務間之間往來的實際訊息傳輸。

trans-unit.source: Initializes and verifies the format of the specified channel endpoint in a service application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 初始化並驗證服務應用程式組態檔中的指定通道端點格式。

trans-unit.source: An endpoint element that enables clients to find and communicate with the service.
trans-unit.target: 可讓用戶端尋找並與服務通訊的端點項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes and verifies the format of the specified service endpoint in a service application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 初始化並驗證服務應用程式組態檔中的指定服務端點格式。

trans-unit.source: An endpoint that enables clients to find and communicate with the service.
trans-unit.target: 端點，可讓用戶端尋找並與服務通訊。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified service endpoint is not <see langword="null" /> and that its type matches the current endpoint type.
trans-unit.target: 確認指定服務端點並非 <see langword="null" />，且其型別符合目前的端點型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the current endpoint element from a list of configuration strings for that element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前端點項目的名稱，此名稱來自該項目的組態字串清單。

trans-unit.source: The name of an endpoint element.
trans-unit.target: 端點項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When called from a derived class, loads the service description information from the configuration file and applies it to the runtime being constructed.
trans-unit.target: 從衍生類別呼叫時，從組態檔載入服務描述資訊，並將其套用至正在建構的執行階段。

trans-unit.source: An endpoint that enables clients to find and communicate with the service.
trans-unit.target: 端點，可讓用戶端尋找並與服務通訊。

trans-unit.source: An endpoint element that defines the physical transfer of messages back and forth between the client and the service.
trans-unit.target: 端點項目，定義用戶端與服務間之間往來的實際訊息傳輸。

trans-unit.source: When called from a derived class, loads the service description information from the configuration file and applies it to the runtime being constructed.
trans-unit.target: 從衍生類別呼叫時，從組態檔載入服務描述資訊，並將其套用至正在建構的執行階段。

trans-unit.source: An endpoint that enables clients to find and communicate with the service.
trans-unit.target: 端點，可讓用戶端尋找並與服務通訊。

trans-unit.source: A service endpoint element of a service application.
trans-unit.target: 服務應用程式的服務端點項目。

trans-unit.source: When called from a derived class, loads the service description information from the configuration file and applies it to the runtime being constructed.
trans-unit.target: 從衍生類別呼叫時，從組態檔載入服務描述資訊，並將其套用至正在建構的執行階段。

trans-unit.source: When called from a derived class, initializes and verifies the format of the specified service endpoint in a service application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 從衍生類別呼叫時，初始化並驗證服務應用程式組態檔中的指定服務端點格式。

trans-unit.source: An endpoint element that defines the physical transfer of messages back and forth between the client and the service.
trans-unit.target: 端點項目，定義用戶端與服務間之間往來的實際訊息傳輸。

trans-unit.source: When called from a derived class, initializes and verifies the format of the specified service endpoint in a service application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 從衍生類別呼叫時，初始化並驗證服務應用程式組態檔中的指定服務端點格式。

trans-unit.source: A service endpoint element that enables clients to find and communicate with the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點項目，可讓用戶端尋找並與服務通訊。

trans-unit.source: When called from a derived class, initializes and verifies the format of the specified service endpoint in a service application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 從衍生類別呼叫時，初始化並驗證服務應用程式組態檔中的指定服務端點格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of properties of the current endpoint element.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前端點項目之屬性的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of configuration element properties.
trans-unit.target: 組態項目屬性的集合。

trans-unit.source: The top level of a configuration element that has sub-elements.
trans-unit.target: 包含子項目之組態項目的最上層。

trans-unit.source: Resets the internal state of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> object, including the locks and the properties collections.
trans-unit.target: 重設 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> 物件的內部狀態，包括鎖定和屬性的集合。
